item.title: Jeffrey add a quote by Jeffrey Zeldman
item.description: "Spec = asking the world to have sex with you and promising dinner date to one lucky winner." -- Jeffrey Zeldman

item.title: Jeffrey add a quote by Jeffrey Zeldman
item.description: "The best way to engage honestly with the marketplace via Twitter is to never use the words "engage," "honestly," or "marketplace." -- Jeffrey Zeldman

item.title: Jeffrey add a quote by Jeffrey Zeldman
item.description: "Real web designers write code. Always have, always will." -- Jeffrey Zeldman

item.title: Jeffrey add a quote by Scott Berkun
item.description: "People who truly have control over time always have some in their pocket to give to someone in need. A sense of priorities drives their use of time and it can shift away from the ordinary work thatâ€™s easy to justify, in favor of the more ethereal, deeper things that are harder to justify. They protect their time from trivia and idiocy; these people are time rich. They provide themselves with a surplus of time. They might seem to idle, or relax more often than the rest, but that just might be a sign of their mastery, not their incompetence." -- Scott Berkun
